General.Name: Ultra Chip
General.Description: Ultra Chip, Inc. operates as a fabless IC company in the mobile multimedia IC industry in Taiwan, China, the United States, Japan, and internationally. It engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of LCD display driver ICs. The company offers professional display products for consumers, automotive, and industrial sectors. It also provides bistable display products comprising pure driver and Tcon, segment type driver, and single chip products; and motor IC products, such as BLDC control, motor driver, and high and low side driver ICs. The company offers its products for factory automation control, medical equipment, automotive devices, mobile devices, etc. Ultra Chip, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
